lines:
ang

nens el

pa

I am not going to with you any 
is prohibit any one Talkiny Political 
affair. I think you have already na 
some of the newes in your daily paper 
you will surprise to see a great 
Change in bla efter the coming the

Pleae accept a thousand Thante 
for you find and invaluable advice 
"When I was in America Tvitt best minke 
and expecting a letter finansoor 
Ismain

Yougartefully

ACE
raw: ang nens el pa I am not going to with you any is prohibit any one Talkiny Political affair. I think you have already na some of the newes in your daily paper you will surprise to see a great Change in bla efter the coming the Pleae accept a thousand Thante for you find and invaluable advice "When I was in America Tvitt best minke and expecting a letter finansoor Ismain Yougartefully ACE

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter apologizing for the delay in writing. He encloses a check for $200 to cover expenses incurred and asks for the balance due. Luk cannot send political news because that is prohibited by the government and says that Stearns will see changes in China.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
